import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react' import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody } from 'reactstrap' import img1 from '@Assets/images/banner/banner-9.jpg' import img2 from '@Assets/images/banner/banner-8.jpg' import img3 from '@Assets/images/banner/banner-7.jpg' import img4 from '@Assets/images/banner/banner-20.jpg' import img5 from '@Assets/images/banner/banner-5.jpg' import img6 from '@Assets/images/banner/banner-4.jpg' const params = { lazy: true, navigation: true, pagination: { clickable: true } } const SwiperLazyLoad = ({ isRtl }) => { return ( Lazy Loading
) } export default SwiperLazyLoad
